items.sentence: That\'s the tallest tree that I\'ve ever seen.
Tom was dressed in clothes similar to John\'s.
I hope Tom doesn\'t go to Boston next weekend.
I hope that I don\'t get kicked out of school.
I assume you\'ll be taking a leave of absence.
It\'s a good thing that you were able to help.
We have to go there whether we like it or not.
We heard some strange noises during the night.
I don\'t think Tom knows who broke the window.
I don\'t want to drive back to Boston tonight.
